question: Union Cabinet has approved an MOU between which organisation and Financial and Commission de Surveillance du Secteur Financier, Luxembourg?
explanation:
The Union Cabinet headed by the Prime Minster Narendra Modi has approved for an MoU between SEBI and Financial and Commission de Surveillance du Secteur Financier (CSSF), Luxembourg.
The MoU is expected to enhance the cooperation between the two countries in the field of securities regulations.
